activity.title: Drag and drop multiple
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Jason got here two days ago, but he’s <blank word="already"/>   been to a lot of places.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Have you <blank word="ever"/>   been to Africa?

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: You don’t look familiar. I don’t think we’ve met <blank word="before"/> .

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I haven’t spoken to my boss about my vacation <blank word="yet"/> .

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Have you seen the new art exhibition at the City Museum <blank word="yet"/> ?

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I love Venice. I’ve visited the city five times <blank word="already"/> .
